mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM( pap.`value` ),0) paps FROM kassie_calendar_paps pap JOIN corporation_members cm ON pap.character_id = cm.character_id JOIN alliance_members am ON cm.corporation_id = am.corporation_id JOIN alliances a WHERE a.`name` = #{allianceName} AND pap.YEAR = #{year} AND pap.`month` = #{month} GROUP BY cm.corporation_id ORDER BY paps DESC LIMIT #{rank}, 1
